page.title: 13Are St Ivians RELIGIOUS?
page.content: Many people in this area are Christian.We asked several people which religion they were.There are some Anglicans, 2 Roman Catholics and a Morman. Not very many people go to church but some people in our class would like to learn about Jesus and find out about him. All mums and dads are the same religion as their children. Many people think that religion is good and worth hearing about.Most people go to church by car.Some people go to Sunday School. Most people think we have enough churches in this area. Some types of church in this area are Evangelical, Free, Methodist, and Jehovah Witness. In our school we don't have lessons about the Bible.But we have assemblies about different religions throughout the world.
